name: btr-swap-monorepo
author: BTR Supply <contact@btr.supply>
description: Generic Bridge+Swap aggregator for compatible EVMs

scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:core && bun run typecheck:cli
scripts.test: bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration
scripts.pre-commit: bun run lint:fix && git add -u && bun run build && bun run typecheck && bun run test:unit
scripts.commit:version: VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git add . && git commit -m "[ops] Bump version to v$VERSION"
scripts.push-tag: VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git tag -a v$VERSION -m "Release v$VERSION: @btr-supply/swap and @btr-supply/swap-cli" && git push origin v$VERSION
scripts.publish:patch: bun scripts/check-branch.js main && BUMP_TYPE=patch bun run release && bun run commit:version && bun run push-tag
scripts.publish:minor: bun scripts/check-branch.js main && BUMP_TYPE=minor bun run release && bun run commit:version && bun run push-tag
scripts.publish:major: bun scripts/check-branch.js main && BUMP_TYPE=major bun run release && bun run commit:version && bun run push-tag
scripts.setup: bun install && bun run build && bun run install:cli
